name: Invaders
description:
Defend humanity against alien invasion, in a roguelike world where you will have to make decisions and try to form the best deck in order to handle the difficulties. Try to get the highest score in each level, develop your skills, your deck and beat the different champions.

Game feature :
- Deck building
- Roguelike level
- Incremental mechanics
- Tower defense gameplay

Just play and enjoy.
